comments.body:
This should be dealt with at
https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/19060/files#diff-fc8edeab30941b14afd491f7f42fb881R1139

Not sure why this is been run before main, that feels like an implementation issue
Because is in the class (outside methods), so it gets run at class init phase

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +525,529 @@    platform='Generic'
    distribution=None
    if HAVE_DBUS:
        bus=dbus.SystemBus()
    # The following is going to be used in dbus code
